name: henry-brown-website
description: Node.js server for my personal website

scripts.clean-build: echo "Removing previous build..." && rm -r build/ || true && rm -r client/build || true && echo "Removed previous build"
scripts.build-server: echo "Building server..." && npm run compile-server && echo "Built server"
scripts.build-client: echo "Building client..." && npm run compile-client && npm run move-static-client-files && echo "Built client"
scripts.compile-server: echo "Compiling server..." && npm i && cd server/ && tsc && cd .. && echo "Compiled server"
scripts.compile-client: echo "Compiling client..." && cd client/ && npm i && npm run build && cd .. && echo "Compiled client"
scripts.move-static-client-files: echo "Moving complied client..." && mv client/build/ build/public/ && echo "Moved complied client"
scripts.build: npm run clean-build && npm run build-server && npm run build-client

author: HenryBrown0
